00027 #ifdef _WIN32
00028     // The file's constructors make heavy use of the 'this' pointer, in a safe
00029     // manner. MSVC isn't smart enough to know that it's safe.

00035 namespace detail {
00044 template <size_t Bits, class Alloc = std::allocator<digit_t>, bool Threadsafe =
00045     true, bool Secure = false>
00046 class fixed_digitmanager_t: public digitmanager_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> {
00047     public:
00048     fixed_digitmanager_t() { }
00049     fixed_digitmanager_t(size_t requested_length, bool readonly = false):
00050         digitmanager_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>(requested_length, readonly)
00051         { }
00052     fixed_digitmanager_t(const base_digitmanager_t& copy):
00053         digitmanager_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>(copy) { }
00054 
00055     virtual base_digitmanager_t *new_of_type(base_digitmanager_t *copy = 0)
00056         const { if (copy != 0) return new fixed_digitmanager_t<Bits, Alloc,
00057         Threadsafe, Secure>(*copy); else return new fixed_digitmanager_t<Bits,
00058         Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>; }
00059     virtual size_t fixed_length() const { return fixed; }
00060     virtual void endmod_hook(digit_t *p) { *(p + last_digit_index) &=
00061         last_digit_mask; }
00062 
00063     protected:
00064     static const size_t fixed, last_digit_index;
00065     static const digit_t last_digit_mask;
00066 };
00067 
00068 template <size_t Bits, class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00069 const size_t fixed_digitmanager_t<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>::fixed =
00070     detail::data_t::bits_to_digits(Bits);
00071 template <size_t Bits, class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure> const size_t
00072     fixed_digitmanager_t<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>::last_digit_index =
00073     fixed_digitmanager_t<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>::fixed - 1;
00074 template <size_t Bits, class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure> const digit_t
00075     fixed_digitmanager_t<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>::last_digit_mask =
00076     (Bits % detail::bits_per_digit)
00077     ? digit_t((doubledigit_t(1) << (Bits % detail::bits_per_digit)) - 1)
00078     : detail::digit_mask;
00079 } // namespace detail
00081 
00120 template <size_t Bits, class Alloc = std::allocator<detail::digit_t>, bool
00121     Threadsafe = true, bool Secure = false>
00122 class fixed_integer: public detail::fixed_digitmanager_t<Bits, Alloc,
00123     Threadsafe, Secure>, public any_integer
00124 {
00125     public:
00126     typedef fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> type;
00127 
00130     fixed_integer();
00131     fixed_integer(const fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>& b, bool
00132         force_thread_safety = false);
00133     fixed_integer(BOOST_XINT_RV_REF(type) b): any_integer(*this,1) { _swap(b); }
00134     explicit fixed_integer(const char *str, size_t base = 10);
00135     explicit fixed_integer(const char *str, char **endptr, size_t base = 10);
00136     explicit fixed_integer(const std::string& str, size_t base = 10);
00137     explicit fixed_integer(const xint::binary_t b, size_t bits = 0);
00138     explicit fixed_integer(const any_integer& other, bool force_thread_safety =
00139         false);
00140     template <typename Type> fixed_integer(const Type n,
00141         typename boost::enable_if<boost::is_integral<Type> >::type* = 0);
00142 
00143     #ifndef BOOST_XINT_DOXYGEN_IGNORE
00144 
00145     fixed_integer(const detail::data_t c): detail::fixed_digitmanager_t<Bits,
00146         Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>(*c.holder()), any_integer(*this, c.length,
00147         c.negative) { data.beginendmod(); }
00148     #endif
00149 
00150 
00156     fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>& operator=(
00157         BOOST_XINT_COPY_ASSIGN_REF(type) c);
00158     fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>& operator=(
00159         BOOST_XINT_RV_REF(type) c) { _swap(c); return *this; }
00160     template <typename Type> fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>&
00161         operator=(const Type n) { fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe,
00162         Secure> nn(n); _swap(nn); return *this; }
00163 
00164     bool operator!() const { return data.is_zero(); }

00167         *this; }

00177         fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> b);

00191         fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> n);

00193         fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> n);
00194     fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>  operator<<(size_t shift)
00195         const;

00197         const;
00198     fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>& operator<<=(size_t shift);

00227         random_prime(Type& gen, size_t size_in_bits, callback_t callback =
00228         no_callback);
00230 
00231     void _swap(fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>& s) { using
00232         std::swap; swap(data, s.data); }
00233 
00234     private:
00235     BOOST_XINT_COPYABLE_AND_MOVABLE(type)
00236 };

00239 template<size_t Bits, class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00240 fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>::fixed_integer():
00241     any_integer(*this, 1)
00242 {
00243     // Don't need to do anything, already preinitialized to zero.
00244 }
00245 
00247 template<size_t Bits, class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00248 fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>::fixed_integer(const
00249     fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>& b, bool
00250     force_thread_safety): detail::fixed_digitmanager_t<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe,
00251     Secure>(*b.data.holder()), any_integer(*this, (std::min)(b.data.length,
00252     fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>::fixed),
00253     b.data.negative)
00254 {
00255     data.beginendmod();
00256     if (force_thread_safety && Threadsafe == false) data.make_unique();
00257 }

00268 {

00314 template<size_t Bits, class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00315 fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>::fixed_integer(const any_integer&
00316     c, bool): any_integer(*this, 1)
00317 {
00318     if (c._data().is_nan()) throw exceptions::not_a_number();
00319     data.duplicate_data(c._data());
00320 }

00334 template<size_t Bits, class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00335 template <typename Type> fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe,
00336     Secure>::fixed_integer(const Type n, typename
00337     boost::enable_if<boost::is_integral<Type> >::type*): any_integer(*this, 1)
00338 {
00339     if (std::numeric_limits<Type>::is_signed) data.set_signed(n);
00340     else data.set_unsigned(n);
00341 }

00343 template<size_t Bits, class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00344 fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>& fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc,
00345     Threadsafe, Secure>::operator=(BOOST_XINT_COPY_ASSIGN_REF(type) c)
00346 {
00347     data = c.data;
00348     data.beginendmod();
00349     return *this;

00353 template<size_t Bits, class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00354 fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc,
00355     Threadsafe, Secure>::operator-() const
00356 {
00357     fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> r(-data);
00358     return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00359 }
00360 
00366 template <size_t Bits, class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00367 fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc,
00368     Threadsafe, Secure>::operator~() const
00369 {
00370     fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> r;
00371     r.data.beginmod(this->fixed_length(), true);
00372     const detail::digit_t *s = data.digits(), *se = s + data.length;
00373     detail::digit_t *t = r.data.digits(), *te = t + this->fixed_length();
00374     while (s != se) *t++ = ~(*s++);
00375     while (t != te) *t++ = static_cast<detail::digit_t>(~0);
00376     r.data.length = this->fixed_length();
00377     r.data.endmod();
00378     return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00379 }

00580 template<size_t Bits, class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00581 template <class Type>
00582 fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc,
00583     Threadsafe, Secure>::random_by_size(Type& gen, size_t size_in_bits, bool
00584     high_bit_on, bool low_bit_on, bool can_be_negative)
00585 {
00586     detail::random_generator<Type> rgen(gen);
00587 
00588     fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> r;
00589     detail::random_by_size(r._data(), rgen, size_in_bits, high_bit_on,
00590         low_bit_on, can_be_negative);
00591     return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00592 }

00595 template<size_t Bits, class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00596 template <class Type>
00597 fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc,
00598     Threadsafe, Secure>::random_prime(Type& gen, size_t size_in_bits, callback_t
00599     callback)
00600 {
00601     detail::random_generator<Type> rgen(gen);
00602 
00603     fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> r;
00604     detail::random_prime(r._data(), rgen, size_in_bits, callback);
00605     return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00606 }

00614 template<size_t Bits, class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00615 fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> abs(const fixed_integer<Bits,
00616     Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> n)
00617 {
00618     fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> r(abs(n._data()));
00619     return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00620 }
00621 
00623 template<size_t Bits, class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00624 typename fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>::divide_t divide(const
00625     fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> dividend, const
00626     fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> divisor)
00627 {
00628     typename fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>::divide_t r;
00629     divide(r.quotient._data(), r.remainder._data(), dividend._data(),
00630         divisor._data());
00631     return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00632 }

00944 #define BOOST_XINT_FIXED_ANY_COMPARE(rtype, op) \
00945     template <size_t Bits, class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure, typename \
00946         N> \
00947     rtype op(const fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> n1, const N \
00948         n2) \
00949     { \
00950         return op(n1, fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>(n2)); \
00951     } \
00952     \
00953     template <typename N, size_t Bits, class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool \
00954         Secure> \
00955     rtype op(const N n1, const fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> \
00956         n2) \
00957     { \
00958         return op(fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>(n1), n2); \
00959     }
00960

00962 BOOST_XINT_FIXED_ANY_COMPARE(bool, operator>)
00963 BOOST_XINT_FIXED_ANY_COMPARE(bool, operator<=)
00964 BOOST_XINT_FIXED_ANY_COMPARE(bool, operator>=)
00965 BOOST_XINT_FIXED_ANY_COMPARE(bool, operator==)
00966 BOOST_XINT_FIXED_ANY_COMPARE(bool, operator!=)
00967 BOOST_XINT_FIXED_ANY_COMPARE(int, compare)

00970 #define BOOST_XINT_FIXED_ANY_MATH(op) \
00971     template <size_t Bits, class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure, typename \
00972         N> \
00973     fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> op(const fixed_integer<Bits,\
00974         Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> n1, const N n2) \
00975     { \
00976         fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> r(op(n1, \
00977             fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>(n2))); \
00978         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r); \
00979     } \
00980     \
00981     template <typename N, size_t Bits, class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool \
00982         Secure> \
00983     fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> op(const N n1, const \
00984         fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> n2) \
00985     { \
00986         fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> r(op(fixed_integer< \
00987             Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>(n1), n2)); \
00988         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r); \
00989     }

01038 template<size_t Bits, class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
01039 class numeric_limits<boost::xint::fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe,
01040     Secure> >
01041 {
01042     public:
01043     static const bool is_specialized = true;
01044 
01045     static boost::xint::fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> min()
01046         throw() { return -~(boost::xint::fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe,
01047         Secure>()); }
01048     static boost::xint::fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> max()
01049         throw() { return ~(boost::xint::fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe,
01050         Secure>()); }
01051 
01052     static const int digits = Bits;
01053     static const int digits10;
01054     static const bool is_signed = true;
01055     static const bool is_integer = true;
01056     static const bool is_exact = true;
01057     static const int radix = 2;
01058     static boost::xint::fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> epsilon()
01059         throw() { return 0; }
01060     static boost::xint::fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>
01061         round_error() throw() { return 0; }
01062 
01063     static const int min_exponent = 0; // N/A
01064     static const int min_exponent10 = 0; // N/A
01065     static const int max_exponent = 0; // N/A
01066     static const int max_exponent10 = 0; // N/A
01067 
01068     static const bool has_infinity = false;
01069     static const bool has_quiet_NaN = false;
01070     static const bool has_signaling_NaN = false;
01071     static const float_denorm_style has_denorm = denorm_absent; // N/A
01072     static const bool has_denorm_loss = false; // N/A
01073 
01074     static boost::xint::fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>
01075         infinity() throw() { return 0; } // N/A
01076     static boost::xint::fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>
01077         quiet_NaN() throw() { return 0; } // N/A
01078     static boost::xint::fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>
01079         signaling_NaN() throw() { return 0; } // N/A
01080     static boost::xint::fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>
01081         denorm_min() throw() { return 0; } // N/A
01082 
01083     static const bool is_iec559 = false;
01084     static const bool is_bounded = true;
01085     static const bool is_modulo = true;
01086 
01087     static const bool traps = true; // I assume this means exceptions?
01088     static const bool tinyness_before = false; // N/A
01089     static const float_round_style round_style = round_indeterminate; // N/A
01090 };

01094 const int numeric_limits<boost::xint::fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe,
01095     Secure> >::digits10
01096     = static_cast<int>(boost::xint::detail::log10_bits(Bits));
